This has the following pada-vigraha: r\xc4\x81ga [comp.]-\xc4\x81di [comp.]-roga [ac.p.m.] satata [comp.]-anu\xe1\xb9\xa3a\xc3\xb1j [ac.p.m.].Then, r\xc4\x81ga has the id 1.1. roga has id 1.3. satata has the id 2.1."}, 'container_id': {'type': 'string'}, 'offset_address': {'required': ['jsonClass'], 'type': 'object', 'properties': {'start': {'type': 'integer'}, 'end': {'type': 'integer'}, 'jsonClass': {'enum': ['TextOffsetAddress'], 'type': 'string'}}, 'description': 'A way to specify a substring.'}, 'jsonClass': {'enum': ['TextTarget', 'Target'], 'type': 'string'}}, 'description': 'A way to specify a particular substring within a string.'}¶
